mapper.insert: insert into cmanage(cNo, cName, cAddress, cCeo, cNumber, cTel, cEmail, cLogo) values(#{cNo},#{cName},#{cAddress},#{cCeo},#{cNumber},#{cTel},#{cEmail},#{cLogo})
mapper.update: update cmanage set cName = #{cName} , cAddress=#{cAddress}, cCeo=#{cCeo}, cNumber = #{cNumber}, cTel = #{cTel}, cEmail = #{cEmail}, cLogo = #{cLogo} where cNo = 1
